title: The United States has more natural gas than Saudi Arabia oil, says Senator Tommy Thompson.
text: After speaking to the Milwaukee Rotary Club on 11 September 2012, the US Senate candidate in Wisconsin, Tommy Thompson, took questions from the public. When asked about energy independence, the former Republican Governor called for several initiatives, including the conversion of trucks and semi-trailer buses so that they could burn compressed natural gas instead of diesel fuel. After all, Thompson said: "We have natural gas, ladies and gentlemen, more than Saudi Arabia has oil." Really? Turns out another GoB politician recently beat Thompson on this road. Let's see where that led them. John Huntsman, the former presidential candidate and Governor of Utah, also referred to new sources of energy when presenting the same allegation as that made by Thompson during a presidential debate held by the organization in December 2011.
